skills.name: Glistening Light
skills.desc: Jing Yuan deals Lightning DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of his ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Rifting Zenith
skills.desc: Deals Lightning DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Jing Yuan's ATK to all enemies and increases Lightning-Lord's Hits Per Action by <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> for the next turn.

skills.name: Lightbringer
skills.desc: Deals Lightning DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Jing Yuan's ATK to all enemies and increases Lightning-Lord's Hits Per Action by <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> for the next turn.

skills.name: Prana Extirpated
skills.desc:
Summons Lightning-Lord at the start of the battle. Lightning-Lord has <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> base SPD and <unbreak>#4[i]</unbreak> base Hits Per Action. When the Lightning-Lord takes action, its hits are considered as <u>follow-up attacks</u>, with each hit dealing Lightning DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color> of Jing Yuan's ATK to a single enemy, and enemies adjacent to it also receive Lightning DMG equal to <unbreak>#5[i]%</unbreak> of the DMG dealt to the target enemy.
The Lightning-Lord's Hits Per Action can reach a max of <unbreak>#6[i]</unbreak>. Every time Lightning-Lord's Hits Per Action increases by 1, its SPD increases by <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak>. After the Lightning-Lord's action ends, its SPD and Hits Per Action return to their base values.
When Jing Yuan is <u>knocked down</u>, the Lightning-Lord will disappear.
When Jing Yuan is affected by <u>Crowd Control debuff</u>, the Lightning-Lord is unable to take action.

skills.name: Spirit Invocation
skills.desc: After using Technique, at the start of the next battle, the Lightning-Lord's Hits Per Action in the first turn increases by <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak>.

eidolons.name: Slash, Seas Split
eidolons.desc: When Lightning-Lord attacks, the DMG multiplier on enemies adjacent to the target enemy increases by an extra amount equal to <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> of the DMG multiplier against the target enemy.

eidolons.name: Swing, Skies Squashed
eidolons.desc: After Lightning-Lord takes action, DMG caused by Jing Yuan's Basic ATK, Skill, and Ultimate increases by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> for <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> turn(s).

eidolons.name: Strike, Suns Subdued
eidolons.desc: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nBasic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>10</unbreak>.

eidolons.name: Spin, Stars Sieged
eidolons.desc: For each hit performed by the Lightning-Lord when it takes action, Jing Yuan regenerates <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> Energy.

eidolons.name: Stride, Spoils Seized
eidolons.desc: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nTalent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.

eidolons.name: Sweep, Souls Slain
eidolons.desc: Each hit performed by the Lightning-Lord when it takes action will make the target enemy Vulnerable.\nWhile Vulnerable, enemies receive <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> more DMG until the end of the Lightning-Lord's current turn, stacking up to <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> time(s).

skillTree.name: Battalia Crush
skillTree.desc: If the Lightning-Lord's Hits Per Action is greater or equal to <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> in the next turn, its CRIT DMG increases by <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> for the next turn.

skillTree.name: Savant Providence
skillTree.desc: At the start of the battle, immediately regenerates <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> Energy.

skillTree.name: War Marshal
skillTree.desc: After using Skill, CRIT Rate increases by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> for <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> turn(s).
